thread.title: Bucks Trade Miles Plumlee To Hornets For Roy Hibbert, Spencer Hawes
thread.title_full: Bucks Trade Miles Plumlee To Hornets For Roy Hibbert, Spencer Hawes

title: Bucks Trade Miles Plumlee To Hornets For Roy Hibbert, Spencer Hawes

organizations.name: spencer hawes bucks trade miles plumlee to hornets
bucks trade miles plumlee to hornets

text:
Bucks Trade Miles Plumlee To Hornets For Roy Hibbert, Spencer Hawes Feb 2, 2017 2:25 PM 
The Milwaukee Bucks have agreed to trade Miles Plumlee to the Charlotte Hornets for Roy Hibbert and Spencer Hawes. 
Plumlee re-signed with the Bucks in the 2016 offseason on a four-year, $52 million deal. Plumlee is averaging just 9.7 minutes per game this season for Bucks with his PER dropping from 17.4 to 8.0. 
Hawes has a player option for the 17-18 season. Hawes signed a four-year $23 million deal with the Los Angeles Clippers in 2014. 
Hibbert is on a one-year, $5 million deal. 
The Bucks will release Steve Novak to clear a roster spot for Hawes and Hibbert, according to Adrian Wojnarowski .
